p: Excessive drinking of alcohol causes various health disorders and negatively affects the brain. The acetylpectolinarin (ACP) flavonoid obtained from the Linaria vulgaris Mill. has been reported to treat hangover by increasing the spontaneous network function of the cultured hippocampal neurons when treated with low concentration of ethanol. It does so by agonistic action on GABAergic synapses mediated by SK potassium channel [ 166].
